blogPost.title: After months of delay and as a devastating second wave of covid-19 gets worse, Brazil has finally started domestic production of vaccines https://t.co/Q6AHdnxQgT
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 经过几个月的拖延，随着破坏性的第二波covid-19越来越严重，巴西终于开始在国内生产疫苗https://t.co/Q6AHdnxQgT。
經過幾個月的拖延，隨着破壞性的第二波covid-19越來越嚴重，巴西終於開始在國內生產疫苗https://t.co/Q6AHdnxQgT。

previous.title: Extreme weather events are becoming more frequent due to climate change. Will the losses mean some property becomes uninsurable? https://t.co/hI3JWtDnA3 https://t.co/Eh7h3WbeEs

localize.full_text: 由于气候变化，极端天气事件越来越频繁。损失会不会意味着一些财产变得不保险？https://t.co/hI3JWtDnA3 https://t.co/Eh7h3WbeEs
由於氣候變化，極端天氣事件越來越頻繁。損失會不會意味着一些財產變得不保險？https://t.co/hI3JWtDnA3 https://t.co/Eh7h3WbeEs

next.title: Ronald Reagan’s tax cutting programme was so radical even his own vice president called it “voodoo economics.” Our “Checks and Balance” podcast asks if his revolution is unravelling https://t.co/qHxVHUdBrx https://t.co/jaUTTXwePT

localize.full_text: 罗纳德-里根的减税方案是如此激进，甚至他自己的副总统也称其为 "巫术经济学"。我们的 "支票与平衡 "播客问他的革命是否正在解体https://t.co/qHxVHUdBrx https://t.co/jaUTTXwePT。
羅納德-里根的減稅方案是如此激進，甚至他自己的副總統也稱其爲 "巫術經濟學"。我們的 "支票與平衡 "播客問他的革命是否正在解體https://t.co/qHxVHUdBrx https://t.co/jaUTTXwePT。
